section.heading: Applicability to future notarial acts.
section.text: This chapter, except for §§1-1231.19(i), 1-1231.20, and 1-1231.21(b), shall apply to notarial acts performed on or after December 4, 2018. Sections 1-1231.19(i), 1-1231.20, and 1-1231.21(b) shall apply to notarial acts performed on or after the applicability date of these provisions.
